Description: Even when a person survives an encounter with a Ghost, he rarely escapes entirely unscathed. He will often find himself waking in the night, shuddering at the memory of a cold and lifeless touch.

Powers.DescShort: Auto Res Sleep, Fear, Immobilize, Slow, Smashing, Lethal, Cold, Negative, Toxic
Powers.DescLong: Souls are resistant to Sleep, Fear, Immobilize and Slow.  They are also resistant to Smashing, Lethal, Cold, Negative, and Toxic damage. They can cast Ghastly Blasts, Life Drain, and can hold foes with a Necroplasmic Grasp.
Your chance to hit has been reduced by a Ghastly Blast.
The Ghost has drained your life to heal herself.  Your chance to hit is reduced.
The Ghost has enveloped you in it's Necroplasmic Grasp. You are Held as your life is drained.
Ghosts can Phase Shift into the negative plane and becomes out of sync with normal space. While Phase Shifted, they are in touch with their native plane and can regenerate quickly.
